description: I breathe life into ideas by building web experiences that are smooth, smart, and human-centered. For me, great development isn’t just about making things work—it’s about making them feel right.
SolveProblems: Collaborate & Solve Problems — I work closely with teams or clients to turn ideas into functional, maintainable software—on time and with purpose.
BuildApps: Build Full Web Applications From dynamic frontends with React to scalable backends with Node.js, I develop complete, production-ready web apps.
DesignResponsive: Design Responsive & Intuitive UIs I create clean, accessible, and mobile-first user interfaces that deliver seamless experiences across devices.
Architect: Architect & Manage Databases Whether it’s structured data in PostgreSQL/MySQL or flexible schemas in MongoDB, I design efficient data models and APIs.
Deploy: Deploy & Maintain Applications I handle deploymen t (using platforms like Vercel, Render, or AWS), CI/CD setup, and performance optimization for reliability and speed.
Mbfdescription: Ma Bonne Fée is a SaaS platform that helps users manage, track, and optimize all their recurring subscriptions in one place with smart alerts and insights.
mbfDescription: MaBonneFee is a SaaS platform that helps users manage, track, and optimize all their recurring subscriptions in one place with smart alerts and insights.
zylopayDescription: ZyloPay is a SaaS platform that transforms the restaurant experience with smart QR menus—scan, order, and pay seamlessly without waiting for staff.
zylopayAdminDashboard: The admin dashboard lets restaurants create QR codes,manage menus, and organize items effortlessly.
venezDescrription: Venez.ma is a dynamic web platform designed to connect users with the best local experiences across Morocco—from hidden-gem cafés and trending restaurants to culturalevents and weekend getaways.
venezAdminDashboard: The Admin Dashboard allows administrators to efficiently manage and oversee all aspects of the platform, including content, users, analytics, and more.
HaveProjectOrCollaboration: Have a project or collaboration in mind? Let’s talk!
